extends java.lang.Object

This is the EmailInfo class as required for the project 2B homework assignment

          This is the default constructor that initialize our address book by creating a new HashMap object with its default constructor.

Method Detail

addFriend

public void addFriend(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String email)
This method adds a friend record to our address book. The name of hte friend is properlly formatted to keep consistency.

Parameters:
name - the name of the friend to add
email - the email of the friend to add

findFriends

public void findFriends(java.lang.String email)
This method finds and displays friends based on their email address. There might be more than one friend using the same email.

Parameters:
email - the email to search

getAddress

public java.lang.String getAddress(java.lang.String name)
This method returns the email address of a friend based on his name

Parameters:
name - the name to search

listAll

public void listAll()
List all friends in the address book and their email addresses

public void removeFriend(java.lang.String name)
This method removes a friend record form our address book if he exists
